testCase.name: handleAuthentication should decode the token and give a user object
local-storage dummy local-storage dummy
authModule should create an instance
UserFacade should be created
UserFacade should dispatch a authActions.AUTHENTICATE_SUCCESS action when AuthSuccess is called
UserFacade should dispatch a authActions.LOGOUT action when Logout is called
UserFacade should dispatch a authActions.LOGIN_START action when Logout is called
UserFacade should dispatch a authActions.AUTHENTICATE_FAIL action when AuthFail is called
UserFacade should dispatch a authActions.SIGNUP_START action when SignupStart is called
UserFacade should dispatch a authActions.CLEAR_ERROR action when ClearError is called
UserFacade should dispatch a authActions.AUTO_LOGIN action when AutoLogin is called
UserEffects should be created
UserEffects [LOGIN] Should return authAction.AUTHENTICATE_SUCCESS, with the user, on success
UserEffects [LOGIN] Should return authAction.AUTHENTICATE_FAIL, with an Error, on Fail
UserEffects [SIGNUP] Should return authAction.AUTHENTICATE_SUCCESS, with the user, on success
UserEffects [SIGNUP] Should return authAction.AUTHENTICATE_FAIL, with an Error, on Fail
local-storage dummy local-storage dummy
HandleError HandleError on login should extract Wrong credentials, please try again ! from response `handleError`
HandleError HanldeError on Register should extract Email is already in use ! from response `handleError`
HandleError HanldeError on Register should extract Passwords must match ! from response `handleError`
HandleError HanldeError on Register should extract This handle is already taken ! from response `handleError`
Auth Guard should be created
Auth Guard should return true if the user state is logged in
authReducer undefined action should return the default state
authReducer undefined action AUTHENTICATE `AUTHENTICATE_SUCCESS`, should add a user in the state
authReducer undefined action `AUTHENTICATE_FAIL`, should add error in the state if there is error
authReducer LOGIN/SIGNUP `LOGIN_START`, should set loading to true in state
authReducer `SIGNUP_START`, should set Loading to false in state
authReducer LOGOUT should user state to initial state
authReducer CLEAR_ERROR should reset state to initial state
authReducer AUTO_LOGIN should reset state to initial state
local-storage dummy local-storage dummy
